TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供類型安全方式來設定 類別的 屬性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來指定是否要快取動態壓縮的回應。The property is used to specify whether dynamically compressed responses are cached. 快取動態壓縮的回應，表示壓縮成本期間第一個要求的資源 （或應用程式重新啟動後），而且快取項目已過期時，造成只有一次。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource (or after an application restart) and when the cache item expires. 屬性類別識別的 ASP.NET 用來唯一識別一種回應是否有多個資源的快取回的應的要求標頭參數。The property of the class identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response if there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 當回應則取決於一組用戶端的輸入，例如標頭、 參數或內容編碼方式時，這非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers, parameters, or content encodings. HTTP 快取控制標頭不直接相關類別。The class is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers. 不過，它可以幫助確定回應至用戶端或 proxy 因指定的內容編碼方式。However, it helps make sure that a response to a client or a proxy varies by the specified content encoding. 若要依內容編碼方式快取啟用 ASP.NET 以不同的回應`Accept-Encoding`標頭。Setting the cache to vary by content encoding enables ASP.NET to vary the response by the `Accept-Encoding` header. 當處理要求時，`Accept-Encoding`檢查標頭，而且第一個可接受編碼在識別用來執行下列動作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果比對的編碼方式中也可以找到清單和快取的回應存在時，快取的回應會傳送。If a matching encoding is also found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果比對的編碼方式中也可以找到快取回的應，但清單不存在，產生並插入快取的回應。If a matching encoding is also found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果中找不到相符的編碼方式非編碼的回應，也稱為身分識別回應會搜尋清單中，快取。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到身分識別回應，它會傳送。If the identity response is found, it is sent. 否則為新的非編碼回應會產生並儲存在快取。Otherwise a new non-encoded response is generated and stored in the cache. 如需有關屬性，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about the property, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 您可以設定屬性使用指示詞，或將設定檔加入至 Web.config 檔案中的項目。You can set the property by using the directive or by adding a profile to the element in the Web.config file. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何啟用動態壓縮可提供從輸出快取的回應。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response that can be served from the output cache. 可接受的編碼方式為"gzip"和設定使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指示詞的屬性。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果主控網頁的 Web 伺服器沒有啟用動態壓縮，輸出快取不會針對指定的內容編碼方式快取的回應。If the Web server that hosts the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response for the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cache varies according to the specified content encoding.
